text:
Tubular Labs - Location: Sunnyvale CA (soon Mountain View)

Tubular Labs is building the next generation audience development platform for online video. Our first products help content creators grow and engage their online video audience on YouTube.

http://tubularlabs.com/jobs/

About You - the simple version - - You hack python - You're backend focused - You've got real experience (2+ years after school)

We're fully buzzword compliant on benefits and environment.
